title: Helikopterrånet
overview: The story of one of the world's most spectacular crimesDocumentary series about the robbery against G4S 'safe deposit box in Västberga on 23 September 2009. How exactly it happened, who was behind it and who actually carried it all out are questions that even today do not have a satisfactory answer. Here is a detailed review of the entire case, with voices from investigators, victims, witnesses and the media.
